turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello. how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, could you help me with placing an order at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: definitely. which Starbucks should i order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you order from the one on Old York Road in Jenkintown, Pennsylvania?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a cinnamon shortbread latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. were you ok with whole milk? or did you want another milk option?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Another milk option please have it as 2%.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you want a 1 venti hot cinnamon shortbread latte with 2% milk from Starbucks on Old York Road in Pennsylvania.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. On top of the drink, I do not want whipped cream, but I do want it to have. They usually put a like a cinnamon topping on it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. so the order is now 1 venti hot cinnamon shortbread latte with 2% milk with no whipped cream, but add cinnamon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total for your order is $4.50.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i process it now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've processed your order, it'll be ready for pick up in 10 mins. i've also sent the receipt to you via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much. That's perfect. Thanks for your help today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need my assistance with anything else today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that was it. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, so happy to help. take care.
